title: How to Make Roasted Red Bell Pepper Bruschetta

steps.headline: Arrange the bread on a cookie sheet.
Scoop 1 teaspoon olive oil out of the 1/4 cup.
steps.description: Drizzle on a piece of bread. Repeat for the rest of the bread.

steps.headline: Flip the bread over.
steps.description: Place back in over until golden brown (again, about 4 minutes).

steps.headline: Take the bread out of the oven.
Cut each clove of garlic in half.
steps.description: Rub the cut side all over the top, bottom, and crust of the toasted bread.

steps.headline: Place peppers, parsley, cheese, 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper in a medium-sized mixing bowl.

text: Preheat the oven to 375˚F.  Arrange the bread on a cookie sheet.  Scoop 1 teaspoon olive oil out of the 1/4 cup. Drizzle on a piece of bread. Repeat for the rest of the bread. Bake until golden brown. This should take about 4 minutes. Flip the bread over. Place back in over until golden brown (again, about 4 minutes). Take the bread out of the oven.  Cut each clove of garlic in half. Rub the cut side all over the top, bottom, and crust of the toasted bread. Place peppers, parsley, cheese, 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper in a medium-sized mixing bowl. Mix well. Spoon onto toast.  Arrange and serve.  Finished.
